name: SimpleTodoApp
description: A simple web-based To-Do application that allows users to add, edit, complete, delete, and filter tasks. The app runs entirely in the browser and persists data using localStorage, requiring no backend.
features: User can mark tasks as completed/uncompleted
Persist tasks across sessions using localStorage
Responsive UI for desktop and mobile

files.purpose: Project metadata and dependencies (React, ReactDOM, scripts for start/build)
Root HTML file that loads the React app
Entry point that renders the root React component into the DOM
Main application component handling state management and routing of features
Styling for the entire application, ensuring responsive design
Component for entering new tasks and editing existing ones
Component that renders a list of TodoItem components based on current filter
Component representing a single task with controls for complete, edit, and delete
Component providing UI to switch between All, Active, and Completed task views
Utility functions to load and save tasks to browser localStorage
